titles.title: Animal Drug and Animal Generic Drug User Fee Amendments of 2018

bill.summary:
Animal Drug and Animal Generic Drug User Fee Amendments of 2018
This bill amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to reauthorize through FY2023 the collection of animal drug user fees.
